attributes.action: Cease the consideration of new police 'stop and quiz' powers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
New powers for the police to 'stop and quiz' anyone, with a penalty of up to £5000 on failure to co-operate are under consideration.

Should this come into force it would be nothing more than one more frightening step towards the UK truly becoming a police state where everyone is by default under suspicion.

The police already have more than sufficient powers to question actual suspects and I am certain innocent members of the public are already happy to answer questions if asked.  Criminalising everyone by default is against the very spirit of being British.
